website_summaries.verdict: Buyers rave about the look of this versatile and complete glass tea set.
pros: Complete set include the glass pot, an infuser, and four double wall cups
Cups remain cool to the touch, even when full
Can be used with or without the infuser
cons: Some buyers say this option is too fragile and breaks or cracks easily
Some of these arrive missing parts

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I looove this! It is so pretty and quaint, and fits perfectly not only into my routine, but into my hand!
customer_reviews.author: Kassi Fackrell

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had the lid missing and I received a replacement product in three days from England to USA. The cups are double insulated and cool to touch even with boiling hot tea in them. The glass is elegant, but not fragile; it can handle high heat because it's made from the same type of glass in chemistry beakers (I looked this up). I used it on my gas stove with no problems and it's easy to clean; all the parts fit together well and are easy to take apart. Great price for excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: This teapot is special!
customer_reviews.text: This teapot is pretty and practical! I love how nicely it pours! Clean-up is a breeze. The addition of the 4 little cups helps turn tea drinking into a mindful sharing experience. Dealing with Kitchen Kite is like being in touch with a dear friend. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa V.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful. I loved the kettle and glasses. It's delicate but durable. I can see myself making tea often. I love the letter included from the owner of the company. It gives it an intimate touch. If you're unhappy or if your item arrives broken all you have to do is contact her and she will send a replacement. This is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Salazar family

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely nice quality and durable glass. I like the cute look of it and it's very comfortable to pour and drink. My girls and I enjoy our tea time even more now.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cantelow

customer_reviews.title: I am in love
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love my Tea Kettle. I have been using it for 2 moths and it looks great. I feel completed. The whole set makes sense. That was the main reason I bought it and I don't regret it. Great product here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When I initially got the teapot, I used it twice and the spout top broke off after I washed it by hand. The owner contacted me to see how everything was going, and not only did they stand behind their product, but the customer service is amazing! I got my new one and, although I've used it twice, I still love it! I gave it 5 stars because I wished it had a whistle, but I know it's not the function of the teapot.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and thin glass
customer_reviews.text: This pot made me very nervous to use it. It's not very sturdy feeling. The cups and pot are very thin glass and lightweight. It made me so nervous to put on anything that had a drastic temp change because of fear it will shatter. I do not recommend this for anyone who is looking for something sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: I got this tea pot today and I feel it was light. I opened it and at the top 4 cups were there but at the bottom is a missing tea pot, I’m pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: liliqin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!! ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I have found on Amazon that is a six star - simply off the chart! Exquisite! This fine tea pot brews the tea perfectly- delicately. It is amazing the craftsmanship that has gone into making this item so magnificent. Tea cups are just as nice when drinking out of glass- pure taste. One suggestion I recommend though is keep on medium low or medium heat to get a more smooth and refine taste. This is a keeper and a great gift for anyone. 👍
customer_reviews.author: AJW

customer_reviews.title: To thin glass...for my wife !!
customer_reviews.text: Edited Jan 16-2018 : Have to say this, as said before, mine broke to easily ! That said, I also MUST SAY, these people, Mrs Katie (owner), she deserved a ...6 STAR as far as customer care ! She when to ALOT of time & effort to recoup & please us, even credited in FULL our broken one and ship a FREE replacement.....NOW, that, I far I'm concern, was not necessary to go thus far, but, never the less, MUST SAY, SHE IS one dedicated customer car ! THANKS.............. Comment from earlier : One I received was a cheep thin glass did not last it's 1st.....little hit while washing it ! very brittle as it BROKE !
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Looking good but not lasting long enough
customer_reviews.text: The tea kettle looks great and I was very excited when I got it. The teacups are the best I ever tried due to the insulation which makes drinking hot tea enjoyable. However the kettle didn’t last. On approximately my 10th time of using it the handle cracked where it attaches to the kettle when I poured hot water into the kettle.
customer_reviews.author: vg

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality. first the paint of the ball on the lid is not good enough for dishwasher and was gone after 2 weeks of usage. second the glass is not strong at all and got broke while it was washed. after first complaint I about the paint I was offered replacement that never came.
customer_reviews.author: Suslik123

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Very very small and thin. This cannot go on top of the stove. This is strictly for serving purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issue
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to review this because the actual teapot is wonderful. Pours very well with zero drips which is amazing. But I’m annoyed that the small glass cups each have an imperfection. You can see from the photo that on the far left there’s a small air bubble. This was on all 4 cups which is annoying. I know this is manufactured in China but it makes me think the company doesn’t care about quality. The teapot is a 5 but the lack of quality in all four cups; and the fact that I would not serve tea to guests would give this an overall 2 star rating. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: crownzeal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. NOT dishwasher safe, dont expect support.
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice! Pros: pretty and clear glass Removable diffuser Comes with nice little cups Handle of pot stays cool when full of boiling water. Cons: Logos are big and ugly, etched permanently in the glass. Shame it marks the otherwise elegant look and shape. Cups are FRAGILE and absolutely NOT dishwasher safe regardless of what the ad says. Very disappointed as we have already lost two and never heard back from support. Diffuser handle is metal and gets very hot making removal after steeping a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: The teapot and cups were exactly as stated in the description and after reading other reviews. I've made tea everyday and it is so much fun! The cups are tiny like really tiny in comparison to a coffee mug(that I typically use for my tea) but they don't get hot on the outside and the tea cools down fairly quickly which is great! It's fun to refill my cup often. I am already planning on gifting this set to a few others in my family! Great purchase and product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Tea for two, or three or ......
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I buy my teas while traveling in Sri Lanka (Ceylon) and other parts of SE Asia and am a bit fussy when it comes to brewing my tea. This clear glass lets me see how much liquid is in the pot. The fine mesh does a good job of brewing but can be a bit difficult to clean when removing the used leaves. I use it now on a daily basis and the small included cups are perfect for when my Chinese friends visit. I had a minor problem with a missing part that this company PROMPTLY rectified. I strongly recommend them. Would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Harry the Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea Pot
customer_reviews.text: I chose to go with a glass teapot because it seems that all of the metal pots rust overtime. You can't look inside of a metal pot easily to check for cleanliness and rust. I've had this teapot for a year now and use it with a gas stove. The only problem I had was that the pot started developing small cracks and actually came loose from the handle at the top. I contacted customer support and they replaced the pot right away. This is a great, clean way to brew some tea or heat water for a french press.
customer_reviews.author: David Charles Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I got to use it for 1 month and 9 days before it cracked. The return window expired 9 days ago. Oddly enough it didnt crack due to use, it literally cracked as it was sitting on the counter! Sure am glad it wasnt full of hit liquid when she blew! Now ill have to eat the price plus buy a new one. Usually I am pretty well taken care of by Amazon , but they sure dropped the ball on this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bush Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Seller response is awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband gifted this to me and I'm in love! It's so beautiful and, most importantly, super easy to clean. The cups are double walled to keep the outside cool and perfect for when my 7 year old joins me for tea. The only problem I've encountered was the seal on one of my cups has broken, allowing water to seep in between the walls when I clean it. I messaged the seller and she responded same day! Her polite responsiveness was a delight and I will be ordering more teapots as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: K&J

customer_reviews.title: I Love this set! You must get one!
customer_reviews.text: I AM IN LOVE with this teapot! Easy to clean, I love to see the tea brewing, it’s easy to handle. I love, love, love, love it! But in all honesty apart from the beauty and convenience of this set, I love the fact that this is a woman owned company. Ladies, let’s support each other’s dreams and passions! You may be the next one!
customer_reviews.author: Shalom

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea kettle
customer_reviews.text: I've used this tea pot every day since receiving it in the mail. This tea kettle is very handsome and as long as you take care of it I can see it lasting for years. I do not run it through the dishwasher but use gentle soap and very hot water to keep it clean. The seller truly cares that you find this product satisfactory -- I do believe the seller stands very strongly behind their product -- which makes me love this tea kettle even more.
customer_reviews.author: Ji

customer_reviews.title: This teapot rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Received today, teapot checks out. Made my first brew and it was great! Katie seems like a very nice, sweet lady and I would strongly recommend buying this teapot from her small business over any other teapot. Teapot looks and functions great, and so does the infuser. Zero complaints. Absolutely perfect! Very excited for more brews to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jakoby

customer_reviews.title: Pours perfectly, Pyrex glass feels solid.
customer_reviews.text: Borosilicate glass ... you and I would know it under its trade name, Pyrex. I’m a few uses in but have already passed four full teapots through this. Imagine if I didn’t live alone! I bought this on a lark, almost. I’ve not owned a good teapot in years and it’s improvable to find one that will pout without pissing tea all over the place like a drunken pensioner after a night of drink. I am pleased to say that the pour from this teapot is excellent. Laminar. Dead-on and controllable. I’m buying a second set to give to my parents. That’s how good this is (I like them, mind).
customer_reviews.author: C. Pilson

customer_reviews.title: Wow-so elegant yet practical
customer_reviews.text: This teapot with 4 accompanying tea cups is truly amazing. Well packaged to prevent damage in shipping. Great thought put into design of both pot and cups. Very elegant all the way around. Tea cups have a double layer for ease of handling while sipping. Cups could be used for other beverages, salads, desserts and other food products or for flameless candles on your dinner table as a decoration. So versatile. Comes with 3 types of tea to give you a nice variety. I am very pleased with this product at every level and will so enjoy it. Many thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: MommyJo

customer_reviews.title: Effortless tea
customer_reviews.text: I have just discovered the healing benefits of loose leaf tea and needed a good infuser tea pot that could go on the stove. Glass pots are so elegant and this one fit the bill. I'm currently making a Tulsi tea with tumeric and was boiling it in a pot which was very messy and staining my countertop. Now my tea is effortless!!! My only wish would be that it was bigger. I also could have traded the small glass cups for a bigger version.
customer_reviews.author: Joye Allen

customer_reviews.title: I loved it when I got the set
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I got the set, then the kettle just broke after day 1. Sad. I haven't broken any glass kettles before, so it was new experience to me. I didn't even drop it lol +++ I'm editing my review. After the seller found out that my kettle broke very easily, they have sent another one. Apparently the old one was defected. I received the new one today and using it with no problems so far! GREAT customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jee Y.

customer_reviews.title: The pot is beautiful, however
customer_reviews.text: it arrived with a minute crack. Not really worth sending back as I heat up the water in a Pyrex measuring cup first. I do wash the pot by hand as I am afraid it will shatter in the dishwasher. Washing anything by hand is something I do not like to do, so even though the pot has a small crack, I would not recommend washing the pot in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: SewBuzy99

customer_reviews.title: Makes tea drinking fun and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!!! I did not believe I could put it right on my gas stove, but I tried it out and it works wonderfully! The tea looks beautiful in the pot, and stays warm for a long time in the pot while you sip it out of the small cups! Also, I’ve had a lot of “anti drip” pots but this one lives up to the name- I’m not even using anything below it on my tablecloth, I haven’t lost a drop! I use loose leaf tea and like that the strainer goes all the way down so it steeps more while I drink. Also easy to remove and save for the second steep too!
customer_reviews.author: ErinGJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute but would never use these glasses in real life
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a secret Santa gift. Opened to make sure was not broken. Packaging was very good. Not sure this is 34oz as it states but not confirmed. The four glasses are smaller than expected. Like two sip and your done small. It is a cute set just not what I expected. Seeing it in real life I would never use these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jrocktheboat

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile little teapot!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this teapot! I can boil it on the stove and I really like the fact that I can use different sorts of tea with it. I use it mostly with loose leaf tea and the metal strainer has such a fine mesh that it catches the majority of any dregs. No more floaters! The only minor complaint I have is the plastic ball on the top of the lid has patches of the paint that have rubbed off. But it's just cosmetic and doesn't affect the function of the teapot.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Spinster

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Durability
customer_reviews.text: The tip of the cup broke, when I took it out of the dishwasher. The product is relatively new and I took good care of it. Was so sad because the broken glass could have hurt someone
customer_reviews.author: Harry Su

customer_reviews.title: This is not stovetop safe. After using teapot a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not stovetop safe. After using teapot a handful of times it cracked along the bottom while on an electric stove. Pictures are attached with the crack circled in green.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love this teapot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great teapot, perfect for 2 or 3 people. It's perfect for tea ceremonies if you're into that. It comes with 4 cups but they are smaller than British or North American tea cups. It's easy to use, pours like a charm, is easy to clean, the strainer is perfect for brewing all kinds of teas and comes out easily for cleaning. I love this teapot and plan on getting one for a friend in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better awesome customer support
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. We have entertained folks and they have all made comments on hot great this product is. We have a "Kitchen Gourmet" hot plate we set this on to keep it hot on the table while we sip tea. Lastly, super customer service from Katie at Kitchen Kite for going over, under and around any obstacle I ended up encountering during my order to fix the problem (including a massive UPS problem).
customer_reviews.author: MDIndexer

customer_reviews.title: Broken tea pot
customer_reviews.text: The teapot is nicely designed. I especially liked the four tea cups that came with the set. I was excited to see tea samples included but disappointed with the flowering tea sample. The bloom did not open as pretty as the pictures on the box or advertised. The taste however was good. I used the tea pot three times to make tea. The last use the bottom popped and broke on my glass top stove while I was making tea. I make my tea always on low setting so was quite startled and disappointed with the teapot and the mess I had to clean up afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Ann Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Set Ever
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! I love this tea set so much! Its perfect. It's so adorable and durable. It was wrapped carefully and arrived undamaged. The little cups are so cute. The infuser basket has super small holes so nothing falls through and is high quality. It has a little handle so you can move it around while it brews. The handle doesnt get hot. I just put a little water in, put it in the microwave, put in the infuser, and put a little loose tea in. Soooo easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great tea.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea pot. I am able to infuse cinnamon sticks, ginger root and of course tea. If placed correctly on the burner the handle will stay cool. The lid seals tightly to. I also like the little cups because the outside stays cool to touch even with hot tea in the cup. Great product for the money. And it cleans easily 😀
customer_reviews.author: Denali Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times when first received but on the 13-14th use it formed a large crack on the bottom. I didn’t use it again after that bit did keep it for simply pouring cold water in for fruit diffused water at times. On the 7-8th use for cold water I picked it up and the handle broke off causing the pot to break. So disappointed as this was such a convenient device. 1 star because it didn’t last but 2 stars because the cups are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Cups were too small, but Kitchen Kite provided me with amazing customer service and did their best to make this experience meet my expectations. I am extremely happy with the teapot kettle ! It is beautiful, modern and it makes drinking tea a fantastic experience. Thank you for being so great with all of the concerns. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Loury Ribeiro de Campos

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this for me for a Christmas gift. I didn't think, since it was glass, it would be okay on the stove, but it holds up to the heat just fine. And the cups that came with it- adorable!! I love this set. I can see when my tea is the strength I want it since it's clear, and the strainer is easy to remove and clean. Love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Idamomhogan

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye microwaved tea
customer_reviews.text: Looooove it ! I’m a tea lover (not an expert) But I love how I can enjoy a good tea now. I got tired of microwaving a cup of water with a little bag in it. The cups are too small but cute. I haven’t put it in the microwave or dishwasher. Very easy to clean and tea tastes delicious
customer_reviews.author: Laura Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tea pot
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use & to clean!! I was nervous to put it on the burner of my gas range, but once I felt how thick the glass was, my nerves subsided. Makes excellent tea and keeps it hot for a while. Bought this for my in-laws to use when they come over to visit. So happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Hajjar-Nejad

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for myself and it is very nice, if you are a tea drinker or have a tea drinker that you know this makes a nice gift or present for yourself. Kept the tea hot for a long time and brewed a perfect cup of tea. The website for this company has a lot of information on tea blends and how to use, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Malfer

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile and delicate, but otherwise makes a pretty presentation for tea service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to serve the beautiful indigo colored Butterfly Tea. It made a great presentation. While attractive and easy to clean, much care must be used because the glass is very thin and delicate. The tea cups were double walled to make holding them more comfortable, but it also made the servings per cup smaller. Overall, it worked well, but I wouldn't buy it again because it is so fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love Watching the Water Boil!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have too much to say about the tea kettle because my overarching opinion is that is absolutely fantastic. I love watching the water boil and the built in diffuser is exactly what I've been looking for in a tea kettle. Its really convenient that its both stovetop safe and microwavable. The only issue ive had is the handle gets hot and it makes it difficult to hold the pot but that's to be expected and easily remedied. Also, the 80ml tea cups only holds enough for about a sip but that's not bad if you're sharing a whole pot of tea with a few people. Despite these two minute issues I give this product five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest quality tea set for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to make loose leaf tea and it actually makes about 5-6 cups when filled almost half way and I only use about 2 Tbsp of loose leaf tea! The fact you can also use this for blooming flowers as well is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Eye pleasing - Great for entertaining guests!
customer_reviews.text: The Tea Kettle can sit right on the electric stove, it is a delight watching the water boil through the clear glass. The Tea cups are well made with insulated glass so it is cool to the touch. The stainless steel strainer is of high quality and loose tea stays well contained as the water blushes with the glow of the tea of your choosing. Delivered in super safe, double boxed packaging, great for a gift! Not just a product to inventory, it is more like a work of art, wonderfully extracted from Katie's canvas and brought to life for us to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. I want more of the tea!
customer_reviews.text: I kove my tea kettle. I have already made quite a lot of tea. The only thing I would want is more instructions. For example I dont kbow if I can boil the water with the fuser and everything attached or not. The teas that come with it are very good. I love them. They are very fragrent. I would love to buy more of this tea.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arnold Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Can use on stovetop
customer_reviews.text: I love the classic shape and look of this teapot and it is easy to use--just full with water and heat right on the stove top. While heating, add tea to the metal basket and when water is heated, just drop in the tea basket and let steep. High spout allows one to fill the pot full, a feature not all teapots have.
customer_reviews.author: Julie in Santa Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned up real nice. And real fast. Handle and lid get so hot when boiling. But I love the set. The cups feel so nice to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Josephine

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This tea pot is crap! I bought it for my girlfriend and it broke within two months of using it. It’s so flimsy that you are scared to use it. Don’t use it on stovetop. I will never buy anything from these guys!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tea pot for over 6 months now, and waited this long to write my review because I wanted to be extra sure that this product was worth it, and I have to say it is totally worth it!! I am a tea lover since for ever and this is the teapot that I have most loved from all the ones I have ever had, its durable, safe to use on any stovetop, easy to clean and use and is very cute, everytime I have guests for tea they always ask where I got it and how cute and cool it is!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Quinonez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and very practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product. I’ve used it for a week now with both fresh herbs and dried tea leaves, put it in the dishwasher along with the cups, and reheated tea on the stovetop without any issues. It’s very pretty in a simple way. The 4 insulated cups are very small, but cute. They allow for the kind of “ceremonial” tea drinking where you keep on pouring strong tea in small amounts. I also just carry the pot to my room with a large mug for my huge nightly herbal tea, which is weaker and can sit and infuse for ages. By the way, the teapot is wet in the photos—those are water droplets on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Renata M

customer_reviews.title: Great for blooming and loose tea
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cute! I just love it. Affordable, easy to clean and the little cups that came with the set just made it more perfect and complete. I use both blooming and loose tea and couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It’s dishwasher & microwave safe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea kettle! It’s easy to use & easy to clean! I use it every day and I also thank God everyday that it’s machine washable. The double walled tea cups are so adorable and a perfect size if you’ve got company wanting to drink tea. I’ve also gotten compliments from friends that have come over while I’ve made tea because this pot is so pretty to watch as is heating up. I specifically looked for a kettle that wasn’t stainless steel & that I could wash in the dishwasher and this was the first one that really caught my eye. I recommend it 100x over
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful kettle! It’s so convenient to be able to boil water in the stove and steep the tea in the same kettle then serve it in that glass kettle again. I LOVE it! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Nice tea pot but zero durability
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pot. It is great for all day tea. Well a little more than a month and the spout has a chip and crack from making tea this am. I am disappointed as I so want to give this product a great review, but durability is zero.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: So Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a Glass tea kettle that i can use on my stove! it is so pretty but functional. The cups are very small however i like that because it is great when a people are over and you can have a little bit of tea at a time. Great product Im very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani1603

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea set
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea set. It look elegant. And very convenience that I can brew it on the stove. Just watch not over brew it because it gets really really hot. My husband burned his top mouth and it lasted like 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: erlina

customer_reviews.title: It broke in 4 days
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but very thin glass. Delicate, the teapot cracked by the handle then it fell off. One of the glasses cracked and then a piece fell in the center. Very dangerous glass. Specially when you have children. I wouldn't buy this again nor recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana33

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous set 🍵
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but not ideal for constant stovetop use . Very thick and durable. Havent had issues but I don't wanna risk it breaking like I see in some reviews. Overall, Love the set! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This teapot is so adorable!! I love it! I was afraid the handle would get hot when I made tea on the stove but it has never gotten hot! And the little cups are so cute! Perfect tea set!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set. It's an xmas gift that I'm sure will be a big hit. Unfortunately, the 90day warranty will expire before it's used, but it appears to be high quality so fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: The Otter One

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i needed to enjoy a relaxing evening.
customer_reviews.text: This is a genius idea! I have to have my cup of tea in the evenings and this just makes my day a hint brighter. It is so easy to use how could you not need this product! I highly suggest that everyone that has a regular tea kettle switch there old with this classy but convenient tea pot. Thank you for a perfect way to end my day!
customer_reviews.author: anna wilson

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE this kettle. I use it everyday. All day. Hand clean it. Haven’t had any problems with it at all. The cups are a great size. Bigger than the other tiny ones I got in another set. The infuser is awesome! And the sellers customer service 5 stars in itself. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea kettle
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea kettle. It’s everything I was looking for, and the pleasant surprise (I didn’t even notice in the description) of the double wall glasses was great! It’ll only be a matter of time before my partner breaks it, but I plan on enjoying it until then!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Weber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glass tea pot!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful and functional teapot. The only issue would seem to be it might be fragile, but time will tell... Makes wonderful tea and the strainer and lid fit perfectly! So far so good...!
customer_reviews.author: mrsstreet

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small tea pot and small glasses that are made out of plastic. They look like they hold 1/4 water in each glass.. very ugly in real life..returned it🙁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really lovely and makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is such a lovely tea pot with a lot of variable uses. It is easy to clean and seems durable, even though it is made of glass. I was so happy with mine, I bought one as a gift. Great price, great customer service and overall high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Montague

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea pot!
customer_reviews.text: This teapot is everything. There was a bit of confusion making the first pot of tea as there were little to no directions about recommended brew time and steps to tea making as I am new to this, but after a trial run of making the Jasmine tea that came with the pot, I am very happy! The jasmine tea was amazing warm and cold as iced tea!
customer_reviews.author: Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little pot. I make 2 cups of herbal tea every morning and night. I was ruining my stoneware mugs microwaving them so frequently. This pot works great to hear water in the microwave then steep my tea. The little cups it comes with are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, easy to use, and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I have been using for a week now, brewing different kinds of teas, and I am very satisfied. Beautiful to the eye, efficient, neat, and works as described, and price is right too! The personal customer service of the sellers is out of this world. Makes you feel like it’s an online version of a local mom and pop store; as if they know you on a personal level! I strongly recommended to all tea drinkers and tea connoisseurs worldwide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tea set!!!! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set!! Looks expensive. Giftable! We got one cup that had a tiny hole at bottom and collected water when we washed it. The seller was very prompt in sending a replacement. Cups are double walled and we can hold them comfortably even when there is hot beverage in them!! We love our set!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Time for tea
customer_reviews.text: Your burgers have to be small. Better for an electric stove. It would be great on its own hot plate if you wanted a tea ritual. It is lovely for after dinner to avoid drinking alcohol. “time for tea!”
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: USED and STAINED UPON DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: EW! On first look the box was mangled and retaped so I thought someone must have returned it, but I wasn't expecting what I found inside. I started taking photos of the stains and patchy tape job as evidence because I realized something wasn't right. As soon as I took the loose foam off the top, I could see the stained spout. I needed to retake all of the photos to add them to this post since I couldn't access my camera role. Never had to do this before. I did NOT order a used teapot and am annoyed that I have to go through the trouble of returning this. I order off of Prime for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Looks so charming! Goes on the stove, doesn’t get too hot, it’s beautiful, it has a good size and shape. I didn’t need the cups but they look so cute with this double glass that I use them. I liked it so much that I bought 2 more as presents to other tea lovers like me!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: my husband has been using this a few times a day everyday and loves it. its nice that it can go on the stove top and also that its not all girly like most every pot we seen while shopping for one. he also loves the cups they don't burn his fingers yet the tea stays hot.
customer_reviews.author: J Maher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful with blooming tea!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and delicate! I bought it for me but what a wonderful thing to gift! The kettle comes with 4 cups that are just as beautiful. I brought the kettle to brew blooming tea - the kind that blooms when you pour hot water on them.
customer_reviews.author: Antonieta

customer_reviews.title: Love a tea party!
customer_reviews.text: Love this teapot! First time using a teapot with an infuser and it worked great. I had a tea party with my granddaughters and now they want one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a stovetop safe glass, (tired of metal ones rusting) teapot that was easy to use, easy to clean and a handle that stayed cool. Found it! The little matching teacups are adorable but I really didn't need more cups. Wish there was the option to buy just the teapot without the cups. I haven't tried to diffuser yet, but it looks really nice and seems easy to insert and remove. All in all, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kaylene

customer_reviews.title: Teapot yes, cups no
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but while the teapot is amazing, the cups are hard as heck to drink from and barely hold anything in them. The teapot is cute and works great though. I may even say to get it just for that, if you are just wanting a teapot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee White

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a gift.Came in a nice box and the product looks well made compared to others I bought previously.Love the cups.
customer_reviews.author: vy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tea set!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally in love with my new tea set. This set is visibly appealing and heats great on a glass top stove. I use it to make green tea and it definitely delivers. I will send this set to a few others as gifts. It's very easy to clean as well. This set is a total keeper.
customer_reviews.author: TeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Glass
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Not sure if this is really Borosilicate glass or just cheap imitation. Broke while cleaning the spout with bristle brush. Prior to that bottom of tea pot burned while on the electric stove which also makes me think cheap glass.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steller

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for stove
customer_reviews.text: Not meant for stove. I’ve used mine for 3 days and there’s 3 cracks on the bottom of my pot. Plus it’s also melting at the bottom. So sad I wanted this pot to last.
customer_reviews.author: Gurdeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: Best teapot ever!
customer_reviews.text: Double glass cups are great. You don’t burn your fingers and it’s cute. Teapot is the perfect size. Defiantly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brianny

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: When I first used it, I was sceptical as to whether or not the handle could hold all of the weight from the body, but it did! I put the kettle on top of the open flame of a stovetop and there's no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love using these cups and teapot. They work just like they should but they also look great. I like being able to see the color of the tea I am drinking. I also like the size so they are small enough that I keep it extra hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Putt

customer_reviews.title: Tea time
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I had not used the cups ( not my size) but the kettle is very nice. Easy to clean. Not much else to say
customer_reviews.author: Astemir B.

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke.
customer_reviews.text: Good thing I have cat-like reflexes. This teapot was great until I had hot water in it and picked it up and the handle came off and hot water went everywhere. I jumped out of the way, but someone could have been burned.
customer_reviews.author: churkes

customer_reviews.title: It was a great product. It was thin and look fragile so ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product. It was thin and look fragile so I was worry it might shattered on the heat stove but it boils well and within the heat well on the stove. I would totally recommend this to others who was a glass kettle. The handle also within the heat well so it cools off within a few minutes which make it safe to take the kettle off the heat after a few minutes. Will continue to try this and see how it goes since I drink tea a few times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeddy

customer_reviews.title: Totally love this tea pot!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Love to be able to see strength of year by looking. Best choice for me. Definitely would order again for a gift and is very good quality. It comes with very useable unusual tea cups.
customer_reviews.author: S L Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very small no whistle
customer_reviews.text: This teapot is very cute. But I have to say. It’s suuuuper tiny. And it doesn’t whistle. I think I just assumed all teapots whistled when boiling but not this one. So you kinda have to pay attention. Not a big deal. But that coupled with its very small size I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: deeanna

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best tea pots that one can ever purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tea pots that one can ever purchase. Not only does it draw the tea perfectly well but it is one of the classiest item one can serve guest or one can use. Purchase it today! You will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Groovy!

customer_reviews.title: Not good insulation...
customer_reviews.text: I find that my tea does not stay warm/hot for very long in this kettle. Otherwise, it works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this tea pot with the cups. High quality, crystal clear, the cups give special sensation! I can heat the tea on the stove top, microwave, perfect size for 1 - 4 people! It’s a tea pot set that your guests will notice and give good compliments Wonderful product! Feeling grateful for the company! So happy for my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, I am big on tea pots and this one is amazing. Very clean and well made. Worth the money. Would recommend or buy for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, look, and love that this is microwave safe, dishwasher safe, and stove top safe. I was afraid that the cups included in this set would feel cheap and the glass would be lightbulb thin but the cups, along with the pot have great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Arah Cho

product_meta.title: Tea Kettle Infuser Stovetop Gift Set - Glass Teapot with Removable Stainless Steel Strainer, Microwave & Dishwasher Safe, Tea Pot with Blooming, Loose Leaf Tea Sampler & 4 Double Wall Cups, Tea Maker
feature_bullets: [ WE CARE... ] and that's why we bring to you this Beautiful and Elegant Glass Tea Infuser! Why not relax whilst you watch your tea brew and be transported to a five star spa experience in the comfort of your own home? The unique combination of usability and aesthetics makes it a perfect accessory to your pamper hamper. The tea pot holds thirty five ounces allowing you to serve four to six cups worth, whilst enjoying your tea with family and friends at any social gathering!

[ LOVE GIFTS? ] “Wow” your family and friends with such a unique gift idea! The box comes Perfectly packaged taking away from the tedious task of wrapping the product. This "authentic-meets-modern-set” can be given as a house-warming, wedding or anniversary gift…the list is endless. This appeals to people of all ages and background. A safe and beautiful choice. Order your teapot now, while stock last - and another one for your friend.

[ THREE IN ONE STOVE TOP, MICROWAVE and DISHWASHER SAFE ] These features make this premium and high quality borosilicate glass teapot practical for use in any setting. Why not put it on any gas or electric stovetop and use it as a kettle? You can heat or reheat your tea in the microwave as a quicker alternative. All components of the glass teapot can be washed in the dishwasher, making tea hosting a breeze. Make your tea however your heart desires and bring out your inner tea enthusiast.

[ COMPLETE TEAPOT SET WITH TEA LEAVES and BLOOMING TEA ] Not only are you getting a teapot but also four double walled glass cups, tea leaves and a blooming tea making it a complete serving set. The tea maker comes with a rust-free stainless steel tea strainer basket holds teabags or loose tea leaves which can be removed after your tea has steeped. The deep infuser goes right to the bottom of the teapot so that if you only make tea for one or two, you don't have to fill it right up to the top!

[ RISK FREE PURCHASE ] You are our top priority so if for some reason you are not satisfied we will provide you full refund within ninety days of purchase. This teapot has been designed with the intentions of improving your tea making and serving comfort. Therefore, I now invite you to make this risk-free purchase and click the 'ADD TO CART' button and alter your tea experience forever!
